properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 5:43AM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Tahoe.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to
capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions
improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE
